channel.title: Jagex cust. service email?
channel.description: Hi, I had my account locked as someone was on it swearing and got me an offence. Well, i had my account locked but cant seem to find my old membership emails that had my credit details! Does anyone know the email of Jagex customer support so i can tell them what happened? Thanks Justis --EDIT-- No one knows? Please someone help and no, this isnt the ban thing so its not breaking rules!

item.title: Jagex cust. service email?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hi,
I had my account locked as someone was on it swearing and got me an offence.
Well, i had my account locked but cant seem to find my old membership emails that had my credit details!
Does anyone know the email of Jagex customer support so i can tell them what happened?
Thanks
Justis
–EDIT–
No one knows?
Please someone help and no, this isnt the ban thing so its not breaking rules!
